name: Query Account Numbers
query: select account->>'name' as acctname, account->>'accountNo' as acctno, regexp_replace(account ->> 'accountNo', '^.*\/ ?(\d+)$', '\1') AS account_digits   from folio_organizations.organizations o, LATERAL jsonb_array_elements(jsonb->'accounts') AS account where o.id = '012cbffa-9d9a-3b17-8762-bcdd35c3ad88'
